1. Thousands of microscopic creatures live on our faces and fingers.
2. 100 billion bacterial cells live on our skin.
3. Fecal bacteria can be found on our skin, possibly from toilet flushing or water pipes.
4. Two species of mites live on our faces.
5. Over 600 species of bugs live in USA homes.
6. Over 100,000 species of bacteria and fungi live in our dust bunnies.
7. Microorganisms can be found inside the bodies of bugs in our homes.
8. Many microorganisms remain unknown and unnamed.
9. The speaker discovered a new fungus species, "mucor nidicola", which lives in the nest of a paper wasp.
